EmailTemplate.description: Welcome email for STOPfakes new users
EmailTemplate.name: Trade Community - Welcome - STOPfakes
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Target_User.FirstName}, Welcome to STOPfakes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome {!Target_User.FirstName},
We're glad you've joined our International Trade Administration Community!
Your Username is: {!Target_User.Username}
As a registered community member of STOPfakes, you can:
Get help resolving IPR issues Take part in IPR training and events Stay up to date on IPR news
You now have access ITA's family of websites
Thanks for joining!
- Trade Community Team
